fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: NOTICE_TYPE
fields.doc: type of notice

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: ra of the centroid of the source found in the image in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: dec of the centroid of the source found in the image in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: GRB_ERROR
fields.doc: [arcsec radius, statistical plus systematic, 90% containment]

fields.name: GRB_INTEN
fields.doc: number of bright pixels in the 51x51 postage-stamp image

fields.name: IMG_START_DATE
fields.doc: TJD

fields.name: IMG_START_TIME
fields.doc: SOD

fields.name: CENTROID_X
fields.doc: centroid position in raw units [pixels]

fields.name: CENTROID_Y
fields.doc: centroid position in raw units [pixels]

fields.name: CENTROID_X_RAW
fields.doc: the row/column numbers of the center of the 51x51 pixel image that is this 'postage-stamp' subarray of the whole CCD [pixels]

fields.name: CENTROID_Y_RAW
fields.doc: the row/column numbers of the center of the 51x51 pixel image that is this 'postage-stamp' subarray of the whole CCD [pixels]

fields.name: ROLL
fields.doc: the 'roll' angle of the spacecraft

fields.name: GAIN
fields.doc: gain of the amplifier used during the readout of the CCD

fields.name: MODE
fields.doc: CCD Readout mode.  The values are: 1-Null 2-Short image 3-Long image 4-Piled-up Photodiode 5-Low Rate Photodiode 6-Windowed Timing 7-Photo-counting 8-Raw data 9-Bias map 10-Stop

fields.name: WAVEFORM
fields.doc: CCD waveform ID. The values are either 50 or 60

fields.name: EXPO_TIME
fields.doc: nominal exposure time for this image [sec]

fields.name: GRB_POS_XRT_Y
fields.doc: the GRB x-ray afterglow position in XRT coordinates [pixels]

fields.name: GRB_POS_XRT_Z
fields.doc: the GRB x-ray afterglow position in XRT coordinates [pixels]

fields.name: IMAGE_URL
fields.doc: full URL of Swift XRT Image

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
